title: Add Matheus Gama as CEO attribution in the app

requirements.summary: Add 'Matheus Gama, CEO' attribution in the app footer below the Android download button
acceptanceCriteria: The footer in Layout.tsx displays 'Matheus Gama, CEO' in a visible, styled format
The CEO attribution appears below the existing Android download button
The text styling is consistent with the calming, meditative theme of the app
The attribution is visible on all pages that use the Layout component

file_operations.description: Add 'Matheus Gama, CEO' attribution text below the existing Android download button in the footer. Style the attribution with the calming sage green and lavender color palette to match the app's meditative theme. Ensure the text is centered and properly spaced below the download button while maintaining the existing footer structure and caffeine.ai attribution.
